Text: Benelli Sport These over the counter prices are best viewed with a fixed width font such as Lucida Console or Courier New SPORT SHOTGUN Gauge Money Charge SKU Barrel Stock Order Card Ribs Walnut Ribs Walnut SPORT Accessories SKU Item Charge Stepped Rib for Barrel Stepped Rib for Barrel Low Rib for Barrel Low Rib for Barrel Wide Trap Rib for Barrel Wide Trap Rib for Barrel Stock Satin Walnut Forend Satin Walnut Federal law requires that we receive a signed copy of your local dealers federal firearms license before we can ship a firearm Dealers will charge you a small fee to receive a firearm for you and to complete the necessary paperwork Shop around the fee varies from dealer to dealer usually between We are required to collect New York State sales tax if the firearm is shipped to a dealer in New York Outofstate sales are taxfree Upon receipt of your payment including shipping and insurance of your total order minimum for long guns To comply with UPS guide lines handguns are shipped Next Day Air and the cost will vary with the weight and destination we ship to your dealer and you pick up your purchase at his store Steve Internet Sales Manager Long Island Shooting Center Freeman Avenue Islip NY Phone Fax Email State Texas Zip Model Name Benelli SKU Number Message
